page.title: 19Mining Village Unemployment
page.content: About 30% of adults are{unemployed}.In Denaby the only producng jobs are in coal mines or quarries,a few chemical works,a lighting{factory}and a wood{ {working}company.50% of the workers have to leave Denaby to work. Some people work for the council or government like Dustmen,Librarians. There are jobs in shops and at several road transport firms including a bus company. There was another coal mine, a power station and several small places like a brass foundry and more{ {shops}but they have all closed. Cadeby pit might close soon. Just under 25% of men work there so they will be unemployed. This might make shopkeepers,milkmen and others lose their jobs because people will have less money. Children in school worry about finding a real job when they leave. They only get Â£25 on schemes.
